detail_desc: Straight-cut blouse in a slightly stretchy weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Short parka in cotton twill with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with metal press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a short tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Jersey lining.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless top in sturdy satin with a sheen. V-neck and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum and pleats for added width. Lined at the top.
Trainer socks with gentle compression on the top of the foot, elasticated tops and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for best fit. The socks are made partly from recycled polyester.
Calf-length, fitted dress in soft cotton jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Vest top in patterned organic cotton jersey with gathers in the side seams for a more comfortable fit.
Sleeveless, cropped top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck ending in a knot detail at the hem. Slightly shorter at the front.

prod_name: TP BOSSE fancy OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Non-padded bras in lace with underwired, mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.

Jacket in imitation leather with a collar, zip down the front, jetted front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The jacket is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace-covered shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with long sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Slim legs that finish just above the knees and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Tunic in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo-neck top in airy slub cotton jersey with a concealed zip at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with flounces, a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and ties at one side.
Long beach kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and high slits in the sides.
Cardigan in a soft, inside-out jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned jersey made from recycled polyester. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, and a seam with smocking under the bust and at the cuffs.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
T-shirt in soft jersey with raw edges.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Short dress in printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch. Pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Sewn-on waistcoat with buttons down the front and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide, foldover edge at the waist and soft, narrow elastic trims at round the legs.
Dress in glittery mesh with a print motif on the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and short, frilled sleeves. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and wrapover front with ties at the side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short skirt in woven fabric with multicoloured stripes at the sides and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy top in sequined mesh with a high collar and an opening at the back with concealed buttoning at the top. Low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Vest tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, picot trims at the top and a decorative satin bow at the front.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Long sleeves with gathers and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Rectangular shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a short shoulder strap attached by chain and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 25.5 cm.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Polo shirt in striped cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a painted metal buckle. Moulded nappa leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Blouse in a viscose weave. Large collar with a gathered lace trim, pearly, metal-rimmed buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a seam with a wide, gathered peplum at the hem.
Short top in jersey crêpe with lace trims. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a small, sewn-on fabric label at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, flounces at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams. Short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Short, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a scalloped lace trim around the neckline and armholes.
Long skirt in a patterned weave with elastication at the back of the waist and buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the hips and hem to create softly draping tiers.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved bolero in fine-knit cotton with shimmering, reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and a button at the top.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Hooded jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, a soft stretchy section at the back of the shaft and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft, stretch viscose jersey with a yoke and shoulders in stretch lace.

Set with a short-sleeved top, long-sleeved cardigan, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft jersey. Top with an all-over print, short puff sleeves and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Cardigan with buttons down the front and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a sewn-on bow.
Cropped blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck and sewn-in tie detail at the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the hems.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication and detachable tie belt at the waist. Skirt with a wrapover, asymmetric, flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck. Decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band and bow. Unlined. Width of brim. 7 cm.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing around the opening and cuffs.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Short skirt in a patterned, textured weave with a sewn-in wrapover with pleats at the front and a concealed zip and button at the back. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short, long-sleeved dress in printed jersey with a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a slightly bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Metal necklaces. One shorter snake-chain necklace with a flat, round pendant and one longer necklace made from thin metal chain with a large, round, metal pendant. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm and 69-76 cm.
Cotton sun hat. Lined.
